title: Qualitative Research-Based Foundational Instructional Design Course for Enhancing IDT Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Blended learning course operating in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, designed to acquire foundational IDT (Instructional Design Technology) competencies within language domains

learning_goals: Explain the six core competencies of IDT professionals and apply them to real-world cases.
Write a report analyzing learner requirements using semi-structured interview techniques.
Establish personalized competency development plans based on future trends in the IDT field.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
